apiKey.label: Steadwing API Key
apiKey.help: Optional. Get from app.steadwing.dev. Enables platform diagnosis & dashboard.

alertChannel.label: Alert Channel
alertChannel.help: telegram, discord, slack, etc. Auto-detected if blank.

alertTo.label: Alert To
alertTo.help: Chat/user ID to send alerts to. Auto-detected from allowFrom if blank.

alertAccountId.label: Account ID
alertAccountId.help: For multi-account setups. Default account used if blank.

cooldownMinutes.label: Alert Cooldown
cooldownMinutes.help: Minimum minutes between repeated alerts of the same type. Default: 15.
